name: Eyeskate Chaos
description:
In this Game you are using your skate while demons try to kill the humanity, you need to get 1000 points to fight the final boss, but you have a limited quantity of grenades, you can recharge getting the drops, but the number of grenades is limitated, then be carefull ;)

Controls:

'8' - Shows the controls of the game

'A' - Jump

'X' - Down

'P' - Shoot

'B' - Claim the drop (pd: the drop appears every 30 seconds)

Credits:

Development and Art: dustflover  /Discord name: dustflover#0297

Music and Sound Effects: Tortura  /Discord name: Tortura#6185

This game is actually participating like an entry for Mini Jam 74: Chaos
